SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.server

Class VirtualTableView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.server.VirtualTableView
public class VirtualTableView extends Object
This class is a virtual view for the parts of the model that are in common for all players, such as the field, the common objectives, the deck top cards, the player points, the shown playable cards, the turn, the final leaderboard. It is used to receive updates from the server controller.
